resources.string: Hello, myself Aayushi and I graduated from IIT Roorkee. My programming journey started with C++, which led me to explore competitive programming, game development, and web projects. I have worked on creating applications using React.js, Node.js, Django and MongoDB. I am also well-versed in data structures and algorithms. One of my achievements is a complete full fledged project built with the MERN stack. Right now, I am contributing as a software developer in a tech giant, focusing on Android development.
